titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to W. N. Owens
CWG13955

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
366
March 11th 5
Maj W N. Owens
Somerset Ky
Major

Your letter of the 8th inst inst, to his Excellency Gov Bramlette has been referred to this office. It is not deemed advisable to raise any more State troops at present. If in future it is determined to raise more your claim will be favorably considered.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky
